title: Daily reminder even a sub level 30 dodges Zilean's bombs with ease
body:
Aside from nerfing R's duration and uptime

E's duration massively and Q's damage

Something needs to be done about Zilean's extreme unreliability. 

Like I dunno, make his passive give his abilities extra effects after he casts rewind instead of this useless XP bonus.

replies.body: They'll buff his damage to a sane level eventually. It may take 6 months to a year, but they'll do it.
